Package gamecomponents.people

Class Person

java.lang.Object
display.GameComponent
gamecomponents.people.Person
Direct Known Subclasses:
Doctor, Player, Researcher
public class Person
extends GameComponent
This class represents a Person on the grid displayed in a Tier
Author:
roshnibright

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Person​(Location loc, boolean isInfected, char direction)
    Creates a Person with given information, automatically unmasked

  • Constructor Details

    • Person

      public Person​(Location loc, boolean isInfected, char direction)
      Creates a Person with given information, automatically unmasked
      Parameters:
      loc - Location at which the Person starts at
      isInfected - whether the Person starts out infected or not
      direction - which direction the Person will start moving in

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw​(processing.core.PApplet marker, Tier t)
      Draws the Person in the given Tier with the given PApplet
      Parameters:
      marker - PApplet on which the Person is drawn
      t - Tier in which the Person is drawn
      Precondition:
      this method runs with the conditions previously set on the given PApplet

    • processPeople

      public int processPeople​(Tier t)
      Takes in the neighboring people and infects them if Person is infected
      Parameters:
      t - Tier in which the Person is inside
      Returns:
      the number of people the person infected

    • canMove

      public boolean canMove​(Tier t)
      Checks if the person can move
      Parameters:
      t - the Tier in which the Person is
      Returns:
      whether the Person can move or not

    • move

      public void move()
      Moves the Person based on its given direction and surroundings

    • setLocation

      public void setLocation​(Location loc)
      Parameters:
      loc - the Location the Person is to be at

    • getLocation

      public Location getLocation()
      Returns:
      the current Location of the Person

    • isInfected

      public boolean isInfected()
      Returns:
      whether the Person is infected or not

    • isMasked

      public boolean isMasked()
      Returns:
      whether the Person is masked or not

    • isVaccinated

      public boolean isVaccinated()
      Returns:
      whether the Person is vaccinated or not

    • getDirection

      public char getDirection()
      Returns:
      the direction the Person is currently supposed to travel in if it can move

    • takeMask

      public void takeMask()
      Gives the Person a mask

    • getVaccinated

      public void getVaccinated()
      Gets the Person vaccinated

    • contractVirus

      public void contractVirus()
      Makes the Person infected

    • latchToPlayer

      public void latchToPlayer​(Tier t)
      Has the Person be carried by the Player
      Parameters:
      t - The Tier that the Person is in

    • setDirection

      public void setDirection​(char direction)
      Parameters:
      direction - the direction the Person needs to move in

    • cure

      public void cure​(Tier t)
      Cures the Person if infected
      Parameters:
      t - the Tier that the Person is in
